subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Despite sloppy play, No. 3 Louisville defeated Fairfield, 71-57, on Saturday and advanced to the finals of the Hall of Fame Tip-Off Tournament in Uncasville, Conn.
snippet: Despite sloppy play, No. 3 Louisville defeated Fairfield, 71-57, on Saturday and advanced to the finals of the Hall of Fame Tip-Off Tournament in Uncasville, Conn.
